name: Tomato Spinach Fusilli Pasta
description: Indulge in a delicious and healthy Tomato Spinach Fusilli Pasta that's perfect for those seeking high-sodium, low-sugar meal options. This healthified recipe combines the luscious flavors of fresh tomatoes, nutritious spinach, and perfectly cooked fusilli, topped with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese to create a wholesome dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Wash and chop the tomatoes, rinse the spinach, and grate the Parmesan cheese if not pre-shredded.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, bring water to a boil and cook fusilli according to package instructions until al dente, then drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, heat the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic powder to the skillet and saut√© for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped tomatoes to the skillet and cook until they start to break down, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Season the vegetable mixture with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked fusilli to the skillet, toss well to combine with the tomato and spinach mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the pasta sprinkled with shredded Parmesan cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
